title: Seared tuna with avocado purée and radish and apple salad
description: Shiso and daikon cress are available at some specialist Asian grocers; substitute a mix of rocket leaves and mixed soft herbs if unavailable.
ingredients: 200g/7oz fresh tuna, cut into a cylinder shape (alternatively you can use a thick tuna steak)
1 apple, cored, thinly sliced and cut into matchsticks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
